name: ttursas Misc Games Collection
description:
This collection contains the following flash games by ttursas Ltd:

- Ball Drop

- Ball Drop One

- Brick Stacker

- Brick Yard

- Brick Yard 2

- Gem Grab

- Gem Grab 2013

- Head of Candy

- King of Greece

- King of Portugal

- King of Sweden

- King of Sweden 2

- Magic Muffin Frog

- Screwball Cat Pinball

- The Wizard of Blox

- The Wizard of Blox 2

The games are provided as Flash .swf files with Flash players (v10, v25 and v29) for Windows, macOS and Linux.

PS. The profits from selling this collection go into maintaining a level database server for Drop Dead: Cannon, Drop Dead: Remains, Ball Drop One and Screwball Cat Pinball!
